definition: studies/schoolwork
to learn/to study/to imitate/science/-ology
surname Ye
line of business/industry/occupation/job/employment/school studies/enterprise/property/(Buddhism) karma/deed/to engage in/already
to be successful in one's studies/academic success

sentences.english: To undergraduates, the relationship between the discipline-matching and the academic performance is positive correlation.
sentences.chinese: 大学生的专业匹配性与学业成绩呈显著的正相关。

sentences.english: Family support was a strong motivation for Wing Chau's success.
sentences.chinese: 陈永洲将学业上的成就归功于家人的支持。

sentences.english: I think most people are quite serious about their studies.
sentences.chinese: 我想绝大多数人都非常重视他们的学业。

sentences.english: Until next time, wishing you all the best with your studies.
sentences.chinese: 下次见，并祝你们学业顺利。

sentences.english: Upon completing my graduate study, I will return to China and seek a job in a business firm.
sentences.chinese: 研究生学业完成后，我将返回中国，在企业谋职。

sentences.english: Now many major employers are beginning to demand more than the completion of school.
sentences.chinese: 现在许多大雇主开始要求纟完成学业更多的东西了。

sentences.english: Zhou was diagnosed with leukaemia and cannot attend class.
sentences.chinese: 后周建被诊断患有白血病，因此不能再继续学业。

sentences.english: Social goals and academic achievement goals were senary relations.
sentences.chinese: 社会目标和学业成就目标是序列关系。

sentences.english: Completes the studies, may obtain the certificate of proficiency which the Shandong Province work hall issues.
sentences.chinese: 完成学业，可获山东省劳动厅颁发的结业证书。

sentences.english: There is no end in learning. A lot of efforts are needed for final achievement.
sentences.chinese: 学海无涯苦作舟，想要学业有成必须经过一番努力。

sentences.english: I know we have vacation, but school is important to me.
sentences.chinese: 我知道现在是假期，但学业对我来说很重要。

sentences.english: You can't miss out on love or studying.
sentences.chinese: 真是恋爱学业两不误啊。

sentences.english: She is ambitious to get through high school in two years.
sentences.chinese: 她踌躇满志，要在两年内完成高中学业。

sentences.english: Most students are seventeen or eighteen when they finish high school.
sentences.chinese: 多数学生十七八岁就完成了高中学业。

sentences.english: In the diplomas shall be recorded the length of study and the subjects studied.
sentences.chinese: 结业证书应当载明修业年限和学业内容。

college entrance exam (especially as abbr. for 普通高等學校招生全國統一考試|普通高等学校招生全国统一考试[Pu3 tong1 Gao1 deng3 Xue2 xiao4 Zhao1 sheng1 Quan2 guo2 Tong3 yi1 Kao3 shi4])/(Tw) entrance exam for senior government service posts (abbr. for 公務人員高等考試|公务人员高等考试)
